entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failing tests in upgrade to VS 17.14p1 #77293

Closed

  • IDE0065 (Using directives must be placed outside of a namespace declaration) is noisy for alias declarations inside namespace #43271
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio operates on outdated cache after git pull again #73455
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35819.86 #77286
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.idex.dev18roaming-35819.94 #77285

PullRequests

Created

  • Make razor generator always run: #77304
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable realtime monitoring in the official pipeline #77302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate Method [draft] #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix false positive 'Unnecessary assignment of a value' #77297
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add test demonstrating issue. #77290
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Flesh out handling of symbols synthesized during lowering of extension methods #77287
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to release nuget packages (#77261) #77298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [release/dev17.13] Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't use hardcoded line endings #77296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Semantic Search query function to take symbol parameter #77272
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove out of support branches from PublishData.json #77294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublicAPI files for 17.13 ship (#77266) #77295
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Update debugger contracts to fix hot reload issue #77284
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update to release nuget packages #77261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch TextDocumentState.GetTextVersionAsync to ValueTask to reduce allocations. #77213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add an option to ignore aliases when moving using directives outside a namespace #77291
    VSCode, Next
  • Fill some gaps in the LSP #77289
    VSCode, Next
  • Update runtime async spec #76872
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Mix the source generator version info into the dependent checksum we get for projects #77273
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Ensure diagnostics refresh when source generators run in balanced mode #77271
    untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #76832
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extensions: include receiver parameter in display string #77283
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Allow expression body refactorings on non empty selections #76969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: more tests #77280
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Razor EA #77194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
